text:
="preserve">Allan Rirme Migi (1960 – 22 October 2020) was a Papua New Guinean bishop. He was archbishop and primate of the Anglican Church of Papua New Guinea from 3 September 2017 to 11 May 2020. He was Bishop of the New Guinea Islands between 2000 and 2017.
Migi resigned on 11 May 2020 due to ill health. He died on 22 October 2020 at his home village, Gasmata, in the Western Province.

annotations.surface_form: Anglican Church of Papua New Guinea
